english.segment1: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me. He has anointed me to bring good news to the poor. He's sent me to proclaim that the captives would be released. That blind would see and the oppressed would be set free
english.segment2: Yeshua Ha'Mashiach stood to read. From the scroll of Isiah's prophecy. This word has been fulfilled in Me
english.segment3: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me. He has anointed me to bring good news to the poor. He's sent me to proclaim that the captives would be released. That blind would see and the oppressed would be set free
english.segment4: Even the gates of hell will not prevail. I've been anointed to do my Father's will. Blessed is the one who believes
english.segment5: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me. He has anointed me to bring good news to the poor. He's sent me to proclaim that the captives would be released. That blind would see and the oppressed would be set free. Open your eyes - Open your eyes
english.segment6: Everything that you have witnessed you shall do. The Father and I will be alive in you. I give you My power and peace
english.segment7: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me. He has anointed me to bring good news to the poor. He's sent me to proclaim that the captives would be released. That blind would see and the oppressed would be set free
